message: how're you guys. i've an issue with stackoverflow, i've been blocked from replying on any question do you've any clue to get this issue resolved?!

data.message: Do you know why you were blocked?
Ahmed Hassan yup "replying on lost of questions in a short time". i think it was like 10 replies in 30 min.s
Rafael Adel it's been a month :/
Ouch, SO is quite tough.. Maybe you should send them a request to un-ban you from replying
Rafael Adel ummm i think i have to. do you have an idea how i could do this?!
I normally use twitter for these kind of issues reporting may be you can do the same too.

Shenouda Bertel tb wllahy kont bgaweb sa7 :D 
Mohamed Alaa El Din btsaya7lohom 3la el social media ya3ny :D

they've just replied with this mail 

Hello,
I'm writing in reference to your Stack Overflow account:
http://stackoverflow.com/users/2441473/alaa-attya-mohamed
We noticed that a substantial proportion of your posts seem to exist only to promote your product or website. Per the help center:
Be careful, because the community frowns on overt self-promotion and tends to vote it down and flag it as spam. Post good, relevant answers, and if some (but not all) happen to be about your product or website, so be it. However, you must disclose your affiliation in your answers. Also, if a huge percentage of your posts include a mention of your product or website, you're probably here for the wrong reasons. Our advertising rates are quite reasonable; contact our ad sales team for details.
Any type of "astroturfing" promotion is not acceptable. It brings down the overall value of genuine recommendations for everyone on the site.
If you can stay within the above guidelines, and offer questions and answers of genuine benefit to the community which happen to mention your affiliation or product in context -- and with full disclosure -- then your future contributions are welcome.
Regards,
Andrew Barber
Stack Overflow moderator
i think that i've been blocked for sharing snippets from my github account!!!
it's a no reply mail they're just informing
Alaa Attya Mohamed Yep and they answer very quickly than Usual :D

Alaa Attya Mohamed Reply them that helping users with gists it's not an issue and it's not promoting anything. I'm not an affiliate to Github by any means and hopefully you can provide a resolution to my case.
i think the problem was that i've replied with a file from a repo i've created before. maybe if i've replied with a gist mknsh hy7sal 7aga
